question: Are the donations made to Sukruthi tax deductible?
answer: Yes. All donations made to Sukruthi Charitable Trust are tax exempt under Section 80 G (5) (iv) of the Income Tax Act 1961 with provisional registration number ABBTS8660GF20213 on 13th Nov 2021 for the duration 13-11-2021 to AY 2024-25. As per the rules of the Indian Income Tax department, a donor is required to share their full residential address and PAN number if they wish to receive the 80G tax exemption certificate.

question: Will I receive an Income Tax exemption certificate for me to claim tax benefits?
answer: Certainly! First, we will send the donation acknowledgement receipt within 2 weeks. The Income Tax Exemption Certificate (80G) in prescribed form as per the new Income Tax Rules will be furnished to the donors on or before 31st May, immediately following the financial year in which the donation is received, which will entitle donors to claim income tax exemption for the donation made. Both receipts are valid for residents in India only. As per the Indian Income Tax Authority Rule, a donor is required to add PAN number in case the donor wishes to receive the Donation Acknowledgement Receipt.

question: How much money can I donate to Sukruthi?
answer: It’s totally up to you. No amount of money would be less to help someone. Having said that, we have made it easy for you to decide. Please visit the “Ideas for Giving” section in our web site.

question: Can I donate for a specific cause that is closer to my heart?
answer: Yes. There are quite a few causes that we are supporting from Sukruthi today. You may choose any one of them. And when you donate, if you indicate your preference we will use it only for that particular cause.

question: Why can’t I donate online from your web site? What are the payment modes available?
answer: As of today, the modes of payment that can be used to donate to Sukruthi are either through cheques, NEFT, IMPS, RTGS, UPI or QR code. We have not yet integrated with a payment gateway which would allow you to donate online through our web site. We will be doing that soon.

question: How do you manage / minimize the administrative expenses?
answer: Firstly, there would be some administrative expenses for Sukruthi for sure. But we can assure you that every single rupee you donate goes entirely to the needy people. All administrative expenses are borne by the founders of Sukruthi Charitable Trust.
